Name: Dotting Mother
Text: Hi there! I heard that this place got a new owner not long ago, do you know if they're in?

Name: Dotting Mother
Text: Oh great golly gosh I'm so sorry! Hahahah, I just didn't want to assume and create a whole scene and oh I'm sure you can understand dear.

Name: Dotting Mother
Text: To tell a long story short I use to be such a big fan of this ol' place when I was a kid so when I heard what happened I was absolutely heart broken.

Name: Dotting Mother
Text: But when I heard that the place got taken over by a relative of hers, I was absolutely thrilled, not to make a celebration of a loss like that if you're still grieving and all that hun.

Name: Dotting Mother
Text: Either way I was hopping I could get something from your shop for my little rascal at home, to share with them some of those same memories I used to have if that makes sense hun.
